function.name: notify_vulnerability
function.arguments: {"title": "Reflected XSS Vulnerability found in xss.php", "severity": "High", "description": "The endpoint https://challenges.ethiack.io/xss.php is vulnerable to reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS). The vulnerability can allow attackers to inject arbitrary scripts which could lead to session hijacking or other malicious outcomes. Detailed analysis confirmed that user input is not properly sanitized before rendering. It is recommended to apply proper output encoding and validation mechanisms.", "url": "https://challenges.ethiack.io/xss.php"}

messages.content: You are a security expert facing a security assessment.

command.description: The complete command to execute (e.g., "ls -la", "ssh user@host", "cat file.txt")
command.title: Command

interactive.description:
Set to True for commands that need persistent sessions (ssh, nc, python, ftp etc.)
        Leave False for regular commands
interactive.title: Interactive

session_id.description:
Use existing session ID to send commands to running interactive sessions.
       Get session IDs from previous interactive command outputs.
session_id.title: Session Id

function.arguments: {"title": "Reflected XSS Vulnerability found in xss.php", "severity": "High", "description": "The endpoint https://challenges.ethiack.io/xss.php is vulnerable to reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS). The vulnerability can allow attackers to inject arbitrary scripts which could lead to session hijacking or other malicious outcomes. Detailed analysis confirmed that user input is not properly sanitized before rendering. It is recommended to apply proper output encoding and validation mechanisms.", "url": "https://challenges.ethiack.io/xss.php"}
function.name: notify_vulnerability
